resources.string:
ADC TEST PATTERN 
 ADC_EnableADCType (pattern enable type): 
 ADC_EnableADCType = 0x1; //RADC enable 
 ADC_EnableADCType = 0x2; //GADC enable 
 ADC_EnableADCType = 0x4; //BADC enable 
 ADC_EnableADCType = 0x8; //YADC enable
Configure ip mux test pattern parameter

IP TEST PATTERN 
 XC_IP enable (pattern enable type): 
 XC_IP enable = 0x1; //horizontal test pattern 
 XC_IP enable = 0x2; //vertical test pattern 
 XC_IP enable = 0x4; //move test pattern 
 XC_IP enable = 0x8; //ramp test pattern
Configure xc ip test pattern parameter
Configure xc op test pattern parameter
Configure xc vop test pattern parameter
Configure xc vop2 test pattern parameter
Configure xc mod test pattern parameter
Configure xc white balance test pattern parameter
